mapper.insert: INSERT INTO discuss_reply (discussion_no, email, discussion_reply_content, discussion_reply_created_at) values (#{discussionNo}, #{email}, #{discussionReplyContent}, #{discussionReplyCreatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT D.discussion_no, D.discussion_reply_content, D.discussion_reply_no, D.discussion_reply_created_at, D.discussion_reply_updated_at, U.nickname AS nickname, D.email FROM discuss_reply D INNER JOIN user U ON D.email = U.email WHERE D.discussion_no = #{discussionNo}
SELECT nickname FROM user WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT count (*) as 'count' FROM discuss_reply GROUP BY discussion_no ORDER BY count DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE discuss_reply SET discussion_reply_content = #{discussionReplyContent}, discussion_reply_updated_at = current_timestamp WHERE discussion_reply_no = #{discussionReplyNo}
